title: output_bundle
description: An immutable output artifact from one diazotroph execution.

metadata.description: Type-specific structured data. Each diazotroph type documents its expected metadata keys. Per-type validation is the responsibility of the Exchange Membrane gate logic.

content.description: Primary output payload (e.g., git patch text, orientation manifest, triage candidate description).

notes.description: Execution notes from the diazotroph run.
